footer.address: Address: Cai Khe Ward, Ninh Kieu District, Can Tho City
footer.sign_email: Sign up to receive the latest information to receive the earliest promotions.

detail_product.description_content: The {{name}} fuses court and street style to give you a slam dunk sneaker. The mixed material upper features transparent mesh panels for breathability, while the collapsible heel brings feminine flair to Nike b-ball.

checkout.name: Name
checkout.cash_direct_description1: - Customers who buy goods at the shop, please pay directly to the store:
checkout.cash_direct_description2: Address: Cai Khe Ward, Ninh Kieu District, Can Tho City
checkout.cash_direct_description3: - As soon as you complete the payment, the staff will send you the purchase invoice.
checkout.cash_deli_description1: - You pay the delivery staff for the whole or the rest of the value of the purchased order (if you have paid a deposit)
checkout.cash_deli_description2: - This form of payment is only available for collection orders.
checkout.banking_description: - After placing the order successfully, please contact the hotline: 0833495422
checkout.success_desc: Your order has been recorded and delivered as soon as possible.
